name: visionary-core
description: Web-based 3D Gaussian Splatting renderer using WebGPU

scripts.docs:dev: npm run docs:clean && node scripts/fix-docs-encoding.js && node scripts/copy-docs-files.js && mkdocs serve
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:clean && node scripts/fix-docs-encoding.js && node scripts/copy-docs-files.js && node scripts/build-docs-multilang.js && node scripts/rename-assets-to-static.js
scripts.docs:build:full: npm run build && npm run docs:clean && node scripts/copy-docs-files.js && node scripts/build-docs-multilang.js && node scripts/rename-assets-to-static.js
scripts.docs:build:en: npm run docs:clean && node scripts/copy-docs-files.js && mkdocs build -f mkdocs.yml
scripts.docs:build:zh: npm run docs:clean && node scripts/copy-docs-files.js && mkdocs build -f mkdocs.zh.yml
